quote: A joke is a witticism or play on words that’s meant to be funny. I say ‘meant to be’ because most jokes aren’t funny. They range between mildly amusing and grimace-inducingly annoying.
quote_letters: A JOKE IS A WITTICISM OR PLAY ON WORDS THATS MEANT TO BE FUNNY I SAY MEANT TO BE BECAUSE MOST JOKES ARENT FUNNY THEY RANGE BETWEEN MILDLY AMUSING AND GRIMACE-INDUCINGLY ANNOYING
